title: Lagspikes on the EUW server
body:
well i was playing fine but latly (3-4 month ago) i start lagging like hell i mean not normal lag like 200ms it's over 1000ms and goes up to 6000ms i checked evrything from cable to my own system and evrything works fine
so i changed into another server (NA) and i was playing fine with 130-120ms (it's normal ms for me cuz i live in north africa and not laggy for me)
and alot of people were complaining about that problems and to add more fuel to the fire the damn game things i'm DCing
I'm {{summoner:3}} from this and i cant play plz i need help

replies.body:
Those types of huge lag spikes could be happening if your network is having a bit of packet loss. Essentially, part of the data going between your network and our servers is getting lost along the way, which causes those huge spikes in ping. 

I want to test this first to make sure it is actually packet loss, so grab your recent game logs that had that lag and throw it into our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Take a screenshot using something like Gyazo and shoot it my way!

Oooooo you weren't kidding about those lag spikes. It does look like your network has been having some packet loss, especially in that one spot where it jumped to almost 70%. Basically, that means 70% of the data was lost before it got to the servers. Typically, but not all of the time, packet loss ends up being on the ISP side.

Reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can look over some of your logs to see if they can help out in any way!
